# Owl Labs Presentation Style Guide

This is a Reveal.js presentation project for Owl Labs branding and style guidelines.

## Key Features
- Custom Owl Labs branding (Purple, Teal, Orange color scheme)
- 10 sample slides demonstrating various layouts
- Responsive design
- Smooth transitions and animations
- Easy to customize

## Development Commands
- `npm install` - Install dependencies
- `npm start` - Start local server and open presentation

## Customization
Edit `index.html` to modify slides
Edit `css/custom.css` to change styling
Edit `js/main.js` to adjust Reveal.js configuration
